Title: Grants a waiver to Adirondack Helping Hands for the 2016--2017 school year
Summary: Grants a waiver in the amount of $52,000 to Adirondack Helping Hands for services rendered during the 2016--2017 school year; provides such waiver shall be allocated to costs associated with special class in an integrated setting spending for the 2016--2017 school year.
ActClause: AN ACT relating to granting a waiver to Adirondack Helping Hands for the 2016--2017 school year
